alerts.title: Flood Warning - Ward 12
alerts.message: URGENT: Heavy rainfall detected upstream. River water levels rising rapidly. Residents of Ward 12 should evacuate to nearest shelter immediately. Avoid low-lying areas.
recommendedActions: Call emergency hotline if you need assistance

alerts.title: Watch Alert - Industrial Zone
alerts.message: WATCH: Drainage systems at 70% capacity in Industrial Zone. Monitor situation closely. Prepare evacuation plans. Heavy rain expected in next 3 hours.

alerts.title: Advisory - Downtown Area
alerts.message: ADVISORY: Normal conditions in Downtown Area. Monitoring drainage systems. Stay alert for updates. No immediate action required.
